Rate constants of the enzymatic reactions with the only BGSN3 were determined by the method of Gautier et al.
14 . In this case, purified proteins (5 µM) were incubated with the substrate (5 µM) in PBS 1× buffer at 25 °C. Aliquots were taken at different times, the reactions were immediately stopped in Leammli Buffer 1× in addition with 10 µM of Cy5 DBCO fluorophore and placing tubes on ice.
